name: RAT TRAP (Shyam_Sundar)
description:
The game represents the theme of endless loop. The player in this game will be running endlessly through a never-ending maze. At every level of the maze there are doors through which the rat can escape to the next maze. These doors however open only when the rat has collects the key that will be lying anywhere.

The entire setting will be in a dark mode and the rat runs around with a spotlilght. There will be multiple obstacles that the rat needs to navigate. The rat needs to also be very cautious of a cat that lurks around. In case the rat gets caught by the cat, the rats get killed and the game need to be restarted.
